title: Discovery call
description: Initial call to understand requirements. Client interested in mainland setup for import/export business.

title: Sent company formation brochure
description: Emailed detailed information about mainland company setup process and requirements.

title: Office meeting
description: Met with CEO and CFO to discuss free zone options. They prefer DMCC for tech activities.

title: Negotiation call
description: Discussed pricing and terms. Client requested 10% discount on package.

title: WhatsApp follow-up
description: Sent visa requirements document via WhatsApp as requested.

title: Lead won
description: Client signed agreement for DMCC company setup. Total value: AED 20,000

title: Lost to competitor
description: Client chose competitor offering 15% lower price. Feedback: our service quality was appreciated but budget was primary concern.

title: Sent quotation
description: Formal quotation sent for DMCC company formation with 3 visa package.
